mapper.select: select YYYYMMDD, SHOPTYPEID, PRODUCTID, SHOPTYPENAME, PRODUCTNAME, ORDERNUM, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, SELLOPER, PURCHASEOPER, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from stat_hotproduct
mapper.sql: YYYYMMDD , SHOPTYPEID , PRODUCTID , SHOPTYPENAME , PRODUCTNAME , ORDERNUM , CATEGORYID , CATEGORYNAME , SELLOPER , PURCHASEOPER , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4

YYYYMMDD = #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPENAME = #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORYNAME = #{categoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SELLOPER = #{selloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PURCHASEOPER = #{purchaseoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and 1=1

SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SHOPTYPENAME = #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

, 1=1
